title: Restoration Protocol Unleashed
outcome: A hidden restoration protocol activates, restoring erased citizens' data and exposing new evidence of early BCI abuses, triggering waves of restitution, public reckoning, and a citywide push for transparent governance. Power shifts as the public forces the Council and factions into direct negotiations over the city’s future.

events.description: Unknown messages arrive in residents’ inboxes, offering fragments of erased personal data. Families separated by BCI erasure begin to reunite and recover lost identities.
Mass gatherings form to share recovered records. Activists and affected residents expose new details of historic BCI abuses dating back to early pilot zones.
Council factions clash over how to handle explosive evidence—some call for blanket amnesty, while Directorate members demand stricter vetting of restored records to prevent chaos.
A citywide referendum is called, forcing the Council to negotiate publicly with citizen representatives on future governance, data rights, and the fate of the BCI.
After heated debates, an agreement is reached to implement an open-access system for personal data and BCI oversight, fundamentally changing the city’s power structure.
